notifications.title: Announcing Redis Community Edition and Redis Stack 7.4
notifications.body:
New: support for setting expiration for individual hash fields.

Check out the release notes.

Get it from Docker.

notifications.title: Missing a feature or found a bug?
notifications.body:
Would you like to see specific features added or have a bug to report?

Share it with us!

And star the repository if you like RedisInsight!
